panels.description:
The timestamp of the last transaction acknowledged by the
consumer.
panels.title: Replication lag (5m max)

panels.description:
The total number of bytes currently queued for transmission
to the replica.
panels.title: Size of pending tuples

panels.description:
The total number of bytes of queued data currently held
in memory. If the amount of total bytes is larger than the
amount in memory, the remainder is kept in overflow storage on disk.
panels.title: Memory queues size

panels.description:
The number of missing transactions between those already
acknowledged by the consumer and the next available for
transmission. Under normal operating conditions, this value
is zero.
panels.title: Queue gap

panels.description:
The timestamp of the last transaction acknowledged by the
consumer.
panels.title: Last acknowledged transaction

panels.description: The average rate of replication over the past minute.
panels.title: Average replication speed

panels.description: The timestamp of the last transaction received from the producer.
panels.title: Last received transaction

panels.description:
The number of repeated buffers received after the initial
packets were dropped because the queue was full.
panels.title: Duplicated buffers

panels.description:
The number of buffers received but dropped because the
queue was full.
panels.title: Ignored buffers

panels.description: The timestamp of the last conflict.
panels.title: Last conflict

panels.description: The total number of conflicts that have been recorded for this table in this partition.
panels.title: All conflicts count

panels.description: The number of conflicts that may have resulted in divergence between the clusters, which is a subset of the total conflicts.
panels.title: Divergences due to conflicts

panels.description: The number of constraint violation conflicts that occurred.
panels.title: Constraint violations

panels.description: The number of missing row conflicts that occurred.
panels.title: Missing rows

panels.description: The number of timestamp mismatch conflicts that occurred.
panels.title: Timestamp mismatches
Buffers sent but not yet acknowledged (per partition)
Buffers sent but not yet acknowledged (per host, per partition)

panels.description:
The total number of bytes currently queued for transmission
to the replica
panels.title: Bytes queued for transmission to the replica (per partition)

panels.description:
The total number of bytes currently queued for transmission
to the replica
panels.title: Bytes queued for transmission to the replica (per host, per partition)

panels.description: The timestamp of the last transaction queued for transmission to the consumer.
panels.title: Timestamp of the last transaction queued for transmission to the consumer. (per partition)

panels.description: The timestamp of the last transaction queued for transmission to the consumer.
panels.title: The timestamp of the last transaction queued for transmission to the consumer. (per host, per partition)

panels.description:
Exponentially weighted moving average rate of replication over the past minute.
data rate is measured in bytes per second
panels.title: Rate of replication (1m moving average)

panels.description:
Exponentially weighted moving average rate of replication over the past minute.
data rate is measured in bytes per second
panels.title: Duplicated buffers (by host)

panels.description:
Exponentially weighted moving average rate of replication over the past minute.
data rate is measured in bytes per second
panels.title: Duplicated buffers (by partition, host)
